description_en: A arms exercise focusing on the wrist flexors.
description_ar: تمرين arms يركز على wrist flexors.
instructions_en: Forearms flat on bench, wrists hanging off edge
Grip bar with palms up, slightly narrower than shoulder width
Lower bar by extending wrists fully (let bar roll to fingers)
Curl bar up by flexing wrists, squeeze at top
tips_en: Moving forearms → Only wrists should move
Going too heavy → This is an isolation exercise
Bouncing at bottom → Control the negative

description_en: A arms exercise focusing on the wrist flexors.
description_ar: تمرين arms يركز على wrist flexors.

description_en: A arms exercise focusing on the wrist flexors.
description_ar: تمرين arms يركز على wrist flexors.
instructions_en: Stand with barbell behind you, palms facing back
Let bar roll down to fingertips
Curl bar up by closing fingers then flexing wrists
Squeeze at top, control the descent
Great for heavier loading than seated versions

description_en: A arms exercise focusing on the wrist flexors, extensors.
description_ar: تمرين arms يركز على wrist flexors, extensors.
instructions_en: Hold roller with arms extended at shoulder height
Roll weight up by flexing wrists alternately
Keep arms parallel to ground (don't drop)

description_en: A arms exercise focusing on the wrist extensors.
description_ar: تمرين arms يركز على wrist extensors.
instructions_en: Forearms on bench, wrists hanging off, palms DOWN
Use lighter weight than regular wrist curls
Extend wrists up, squeeze at top
tips_en: Using same weight as wrist curls → Extensors need 50-60% of that weight
Going too fast → Control every rep

description_en: A arms exercise focusing on the brachioradialis.
description_ar: تمرين arms يركز على brachioradialis.
instructions_en: Stand with overhand (pronated) grip on barbell
Elbows at sides, don't let them drift forward
Curl bar up, keeping wrists straight
tips_en: Using too much weight → You'll curl 40-50% less than regular curls
Letting wrists bend → Keep them neutral

description_en: A arms exercise focusing on the biceps (concentric), brachioradialis (eccentric).
description_ar: تمرين arms يركز على biceps (concentric), brachioradialis (eccentric).
instructions_en: Curl up with palms facing UP (supinated)
At top, rotate palms to face DOWN (pronated)
Rotate back to palms up at bottom
Best of both worlds: biceps + forearms

description_en: A arms exercise focusing on the brachioradialis, biceps.
description_ar: تمرين arms يركز على brachioradialis, biceps.
instructions_en: Hold dumbbells with neutral grip (palms facing each other)
Curl up keeping thumbs pointing to ceiling
Don't rotate wrists - maintain neutral throughout
Squeeze at top, control the descent

description_en: A arms exercise focusing on the grip (crushing), all forearms.
description_ar: تمرين arms يركز على grip (crushing), all forearms.
instructions_en: Pick up weights with neutral spine
Stand tall, shoulders back and down
Squeeze handles as hard as possible
tips_en: Letting shoulders shrug up → Keep them down
Taking long strides → Short steps for stability

description_en: A arms exercise focusing on the pinch grip, thumb strength.

instructions_en: Pinch two plates together, smooth sides out
Grip with thumb on one side, fingers on other
Stand upright and hold for time

description_en: A arms exercise focusing on the support grip, forearm flexors.

instructions_en: Relax shoulders (passive hang) or engage lats (active hang)
Aim for cumulative time (e.g., 5 minutes total)

description_en: A arms exercise focusing on the pronator teres, supinator.
description_ar: تمرين arms يركز على pronator teres, supinator.
instructions_en: Hold dumbbell in one end (hammer style)
Rest forearm on bench or knee
Rotate forearm palm up (supination) then palm down (pronation)
Control the movement - don't use momentum

description_en: A arms exercise focusing on the finger flexors.
description_ar: تمرين arms يركز على finger flexors.
instructions_en: Let bar roll down to fingertips
Curl fingers to bring bar back to palm
Then add wrist curl if desired
Great for rock climbers and grapplers
